data.actual_result: He will be unblock even if the message apears "User has been blocked"
data.expected_result: He will stay blocked and he will have no longer the Friend Request
data.short_description: Unblocked Someone by Removing him from your friend's list
data.steps_to_repro: - Add Someone as a friend ( He needs to not accept the invite) - Tap the 3 dots on his profile - On the same time , Tap "Block" and directly after tap "Friend Request Sent" (You need to be fast ) - Tap "Delete"
